games.title: KovaaK's
games.description: KovaaK's is a highly popular, community-driven aim trainer for PC, designed to improve mechanical aiming skills for first-person (FPS) and third-person (TPS) shooter games through extensive customization and thousands of user-created scenarios, offering detailed tracking, flicking, and click-timing drills with cloned game physics for authentic feel, used by pros to build muscle memory and consistency across various titles like Valorant, Fortnite, and CS:GO
